mapper.sql: id, userId, morningRevial, twoAltarPray, PSRP, threeOld, threeOldNum, oneNew, oneNewNum, personalPray, shepherd, gospel, meeting, meetingType, prophesy, time, systemCode
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM t_recoverylife t1, t_userinfo t2, t_home t3, t_group t4, t_district t5, t_church t6 WHERE t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.homeId = t3.id AND t2.groupId = t4.id AND t4.districtId = t5.id AND t5.churchId = t6.id
AND t2.userId=#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select threeOld, threeOldNum, oneNew, oneNewNum from t_recoverylife where userId=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

mapper.update:
update t_recoverylife
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
morningRevial = #{morningrevial,jdbcType=INTEGER},
twoAltarPray = #{twoaltarpray,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PSRP = #{psrp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
threeOld = #{threeold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
threeOldNum = #{threeoldnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
oneNew = #{onenew,jdbcType=INTEGER},
oneNewNum = #{onenewnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
personalPray = #{personalpray,jdbcType=INTEGER},

meeting = #{meeting,jdbcType=INTEGER},
meetingType = #{meetingtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prophesy = #{prophesy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
systemCode = #{systemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
